Name: Ball Boys
About the game: Ball Boys is an online ball-racing championship where you play as a customizable ball and try to score the most points in various parkour challenges. You can roll, double-jump, dash, and maneuver in the air to try and navigate your way through various scenarios. Key Features: Procedurally-generated tracks, so every parkour is unique. Public and Private games with up to 10 players. 20 values of RGB customization for each trail and ball. The soundtrack of Ball Boys is shuffled for added variety. After each championship concludes, players will be given coins based on their performance. These coins can be spent on customizations for their balls such as skins, trails, and hats. Everyone in-game will be able to see your swag, so make sure you choose wisely.
